Text.Page:
The Free Traders Collective is a pain in my ass!

The {@linkcreature:121#202#Aurum mugatos} and {@linkcreature:121#205#badlands ghilliedhus} are rife with noctenium and provide the traders with an abundance. If we kill their own beasts and seize that noctenium, it will add to the strength of the Iron Order.

Go to the Free Traders territory, kill the beasts and I'll reward you with refined noctenium. Any noctenium you pick up from them is also yours!

Good work. Remember, there's always more to be done.
For the Iron Order!
